column1: The Monica Set With A 1 Carat Round Lab Diamond
column4: The Monica is a true masterpiece that combines sleek refinement with icy sparkle. The centerpiece is a magnificent diamond that sparkles from every angle
column5: surrounded by a glittering hidden halo that adds extra brilliance to the already stunning stone. The slender band is adorned with channel set baguette diamonds that perfectly complement the center stone. With its classic elegance and modern sophistication
column6: The Monica engagement ring is the perfect way to celebrate your love story.
